pages.text: $(li)The Voline is a hostile creature that can be found in Nether Waste Biomes of the Nether.$(br)$(li)Holding a Magma Cream in your hand in front of it, will make it stop from attacking you by a moment.$(br)$(li)This creature may drops Golden Nuggets on death.
$(li)If you drop a Magma Cream on the ground near of a Voline, it will start to eat it.
$(li)For every one that it eats, it will become more and more slow and fat.
$(li)When it eats a good quantity of them, it will emit smoke.
$(li)Now you can drop Golden items to the ground that it will eat them too. Later, it will drop Golden Nuggets or Molten Gold Clusters.
